reviews.text: The rooms are comfortable and the adapted bathroom has enough transfer

I was conducting business in the Arlanda area of Stockholm and found the Radisson Blu SkyCity to be very convenient to my meetings. The hotel is easily reached from the Arrivals hall of the airport after just a short walk. The rooms are well-appointed and the bed was comfortable enough for a decent night's sleep. My room looked out onto the airport tarmac and I was pleasantly surprised that I was never bothered by aircraft noise. Apparently, the hotel is well insulated from outside sounds and it was a peaceful stay. I found it impossible, however, to adequately adjust the room temperature as the ventilation system seemed to blow only cold air. Coming from a very warm climate, I was disappointed that i couldn't warm up the room, even with outside temperatures in the low teens C.
reviews.title: Nice hotel, but very expensive
Most bizarre room decor ... But great hotel!
reviews.text: The only other down side to the Radisson SkyCity is the very high room rates and equally high prices for food. The convenience of the location made up for some of the sticker shock, however, and I will stay again at this property when my travels take me to the Arlanda area.

Take an upper class standard hotel... add some very friendly receptionists... add an above standard breakfast and a room with a nice bed and all amenities. And then add a room decoration which is almost bizarre. Red colors. Marimekko style carpet. An over-sized chili as decoration on the wall. Red painted ceiling. Zebra-patterns everywhere.
reviews.title: sleeping at the terminal

reviews.text: Such a room will surely make you laugh out loud ... Or maybe you will simply love it. Depends.
reviews.title: A long way from town

reviews.text: The hotel is a little bit worn. But everything is nice and clean. Location is excellent if you need an airport hotel. Easy to reach from all terminals.
reviews.title: Excellent Accommodation and Location in the Airport terminal

reviews.text: Stayed here for 1 night in August 2012 with the family.
reviews.title: Best option at the airport

reviews.text: We were stranded at the airport due to some flight issues and decided to stay over at the airport since we were on an early morning flight out the next day and in no mood to spring for a SEK500 cab ride each way back to the city, since we had 3 large bags.
reviews.title: Very quiet and convenient

reviews.text: The hotel is located in Sky City, about a 5 min walk from Terminal 5...in between the terminals at Arlanda. The location is as good as it gets.
reviews.title: comfortable and convenient -- for a price

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The front desk staff were very helpful and friendly, and got us checked in ASAP, despite not having a reservation...since we were left at the airport unexpectedly.
reviews.title: Good start at a holiday

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel hallways seem a bit worn out, as mentioned by several visitors and smelled a bit funky...however the room was great. The bed was very comfortable, and there were adequate number of pillows, which we always found to be a problem across Scandinavia...although most hotels would willingly provide more on request. The bathroom also had a good pressure shower and was larger than most bathrooms we had on our trip. We were in a Biz Class room, so had a good view of the tarmac as well, which our 2 year old loved.
reviews.title: Tack!

reviews.text: This is a great hotel when you are leaving with an early moring flight. really close to the terminals and has all that you need. Nice beds and the rooms are quiet. Breakfast is expensive so you may have it included in the price or choose to have your breakfast some other place.
reviews.title: Great for one nights before your flight

reviews.text: Location / convenience: Located in SkyCity in the middle of all terminals, perfect for an early flight out.
reviews.title: Best Arlanda airport hotel

reviews.text: Check-in: No problems, got upgraded to a BusinessClass room (Club carlson Gold) on 5th floor with a nice tarmac-view.
reviews.title: Expensive, but comfortable.

reviews.title: Sky City = Excellent

aka: Radisson Blu Skycity Hotel, Arlanda Airport Hotel Arlandastad
description: This four star hotel has a unique location and is situated between terminal 4 and 5 at Stockholm-Arlanda airport. Each of the hotel's 230 sound-proof guest rooms features mini bar, TV, air condition and free coffee and tea making facilities in the room. All guests have free high-speed wireless Internet access as well as entrance to the fitness center SATS that offers a sauna, jacuzzi and exercise machines. The Super Breakfast Buffet is served from 5 am every morning with a view over the runway. At the restaurant Stockholm Fisk Arlanda you can order exceptional seafood dishes. Enjoy the international atmosphere in the hotel bar while watching airplanes taking off and landing. The hotel is certified by the Nordic Ecolabel (Svanen) and has a Climate Neutral Certification. Stockholm City is just 20 minutes away with expresstrain.
